Verses: 1 aagilum Avar Sebulon Naattaiyum, Napthali Naattaiyum Idukkamaai Eenappaduththina Mundhina Kaalaththilirundhadhupola Adhu Irundiruppadhillai; Enendraal Avar Kadarkaraiyarugilum, Yordhaan Nadhiyoraththilumulla Purajaadhiyaarudaiya Kalileyaavaagiya Aththesaththaip Pirkaalaththile Magimaippaduththuvaar.
2 irulil Nadakkira Janangal Periya Velichchaththaik Kandaargal; Marana Irulin Dhesaththil Kudiyirukkiravargalinmel Velichcham Pragaasiththadhu.
3 andha Jaadhiyaith Thiralaakki, Adharku Magizhchchiyaip Perugappannineer; Aruppil Magizhgiradhupolavum, Kollaiyaip Pangittukkollugaiyil Kalikoorugiradhupolavum, Umakkumunbaaga Magizhugiraargal.
4 meedhiyaaniyarin Naalil Nadandhadhupola, Avargal Sumandha Nugaththadiyaiyum Avargal Tholinmelirundha Milaatraiyum, Avargal Aalottiyin Kolaiyum Muriththuppotteer.
5 amaliyaai Yuththampannugira Veerarudaiya Aayudhavarkkangalum, Raththaththil Puranda Uduppum Akkinikku Iraiyaaga Sutterikkappadum.

6 namakku Oru Paalagan Pirandhaar; Namakku Oru Kumaaran Kodukkappattaar; Karththaththuvam Avar Tholinmelirukkum; Avar Naamam Adhisayamaanavar, Aalosanaik Karththaa, Vallamaiyulla Dhevan, Niththiya Pidhaa, Samaadhaanapprabu Ennappadum.

7 dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththaiyum Avanudaiya Raajyaththaiyum Avar Thidappaduththi Adhai Idhumudharkondu Endrendraikkum Nyaayaththilum Needhiyinaalum Nilaippaduththumpadikku, Avarudaiya Karththaththuvaththin Perukkaththukkum, Adhin Samaadhaanaththukkum Mudivillai; Senaigalin Karththarudaiya Vairaakkiyam Idhai Seyyum.
8 aandavar Yaakkobukku Oruvaarththaiyai Anuppinaar; Adhu Isravelinmel Irangitru.
9 sengalkattu Idindhupoyitru, Polindha Kallaale Thirumbakkattuvom; Kaattaththimarangal Vettippodappattadhu, Avaigalukkup Padhilaagak Kedhurumarangalai Vaippom Endru,
10 agandhaiyum, Manapperumaiyumaai Sollugira Eppiraayeemarum, Samaariyaavin Kudigalumaagiya Ellaa Janaththukkum Adhu Theriyavarum.
11 aadhalaal Karththar Redhseenudaiya Saththurukkalai Avargalmel Uyarththi, Avargaludaiya Matra Saththurukkalai Avargalode Koottik Kalappaar.

12 murpuraththil Seeriyarum, Pirpuraththil Pelistharum Vandhu, Isravelaith Thirandhavaayaal Patchippaargal; Ivaiyellaavatrilum Avarudaiya Kobam Aaraamal, Innum Avarudaiya Kai Neettinapadiye Irukkiradhu,
13 janangal Thangalai Adikkiravaridaththil Thirumbaamalum, Senaigalin Karththaraith Thedaamalum Irukkiraargal.
14 aagaiyaal Karththar Isravelile Thalaiyaiyum, Vaalaiyum, Kilaiyaiyum, Naanalaiyum, Ore Naalile Vettippoduvaar.
15 mooppanum Ganamporundhinavanume Thalai, Poippodhagampannugira Theerkkadharisiye Vaal.
16 indha Janaththai Nadaththugiravargal Eththarumaai, Avargalaal Nadaththappadugiravargal Naasamadaigiravargalumaai Irukkiraargal.

17 aadhalaal, Aandavar Avargal Vaalibarmel Piriyamaayiruppadhillai; Avargalilirukkira Thikkatra Pillaigalmelum Vidhavaigalmelum Iranguvadhumillai; Avargal Anaivarum Maayakkaararum Pollaadhavargalumaayirukkiraargal; Ellaa Vaayum Aagaamiyam Pesum; Ivaiyellaavatrilum Avarudaiya Kobam Aaraamal Innum Avarudaiya Kai Neettinapadiye Irukkiradhu.
18 aagaamiyamaanadhu Akkiniyaippola Erigiradhu; Adhu Mutchediyaiyum Nerinjilaiyum Patchikkum, Adhu Nerungiya Kaattaik Koluththum, Pagai Thirandu Ezhumbum.
19 senaigalin Karththarudaiya Sinaththaal Dhesam Andhagaarappattu, Janangal Akkinikku Iraiyaavaargal; Oruvanum Than Sagodharanaith Thappavidaan.
20 valadhupuraththil Patchiththaalum Pasiththiruppaargal; Idadhupuraththil Thindraalum Thirupthiyadaiyaargal; Avanavan Thanthan Buyaththin Maamsaththaith Thinbaan.

21 manaase Eppiraayeemaiyum, Eppiraayeem Manaaseyaiyum Patchippaargal; Ivargal Egamaai Yoodhaavukku Virodhamaayiruppaargal; Ivaiyellaavatrilum Avarudaiya Kobam Aaraamal Innum Avarudaiya Kai Neettinapadiye Irukkiradhu.
